name: MrDoodle
description:
MrDoodle is 2D platform game where you throw your hat at enemies and collect cups of tea.
It is an old style platform game with simple controls.

MrDoodle is designed for a single player who wants a very quick game (30 seconds to 3 minutes) on their desktop computer.

The artwork is for 16:10 and 16:9 monitors 1680 x 1050 and upwards (it scales down too if you really have a tiny screen or want to play it windowed).

5 enemy types (Balloon, Newspapers, Angry Heads, Flowers, Birds)
8 levels of enemy numbers (Rally, Crowd, Throng, Horde, Swarm, Army, Flood, Torrent)
5 enemy speeds (Snail, Squirrel, Rabbit, Whippet, Cheetah)
8 one-screen platform levels to choose from

High Score table
Video and Audio option
Rebindable Keys
